decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (12/15/WRI/101/A, dated Dec 2013, received 18/12/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 4 - The front boundary treatment as shown on the submitted plans (12/15/WRI/101/A, dated Dec 2013, received 18/12/2013) and labeled as "landscaped planters etc" shall be a minimum of 20cm high and not exceed 60 cm high and designed to prevent vehicles crossing over.  It shall be installed before the footway crossover is first brought into use and shall be permanently retained thereafter
description: Creation of a vehicular access to the front of the property and formation of a hardstanding
